com.gwtext.client.core
Class Ajax

java.lang.Object
  com.gwtext.client.core.JsObject
      com.gwtext.client.core.Connection
          com.gwtext.client.core.Ajax

public class Ajax
extends Connection

Global Ajax request class. This class is a singleton and cannot be created directly.
